abstracts.cdata!:
This report on Multi-sectoral Capacity
            Building deals with the project to strengthen public sector
            capacity (PSCBP) that seeks to increase the capacity of
            public sector entities for more effective, efficient,
            transparent and accountable implementation, in their roles
            and redefined functions and for the success of their
            strategic objectives contributing to the implementation of
            Reduction Strategy Document (PRSPs). PSCBP supports the
            implementation of the expanded program of government, the
            Multi-sectoral Program to strengthen capacity (MSCBP), which
            seeks to minimize any lack of competence resulting from the
            effects of war and genocide by strengthening capacity at
            central and local levels of government, the private sector
            and civil society
